alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Nicholas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 31 at 1:27PM EDT until April 02 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM SATURDAY TO 3 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Southeast Nicholas, Southeast Webster, Northwest Pocahontas, Northwest Randolph and Southeast Randolph Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM Saturday to 3 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Nicholas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster
